about_the_game:
The RAIDBORN Founder's Pack offers a collection of rare and exclusive bonus content, typically reserved for special occasions. Support development and get immediate access to all future free DLC packs.

Explore 12 thematic equipment sets, each tailored to a specific theme and playstyle. From Warlock to Cleric to Pirate, with 60 legendary items and more than 20 new enchantments introduced to the game, this pack has you covered for all your raiding needs.

The different equipment sets become available immediately after you complete the tutorial and cost a specific amount of in-game gold to be unlocked. The Founder's Pack will also be expanded with new content, mechanics and bonus material in the future.



VAMPIRE
Become a vampire and drink the blood of your enemies. Steal their health and use your never-ending hunger to your advantage.

CLERIC
Become a blessed cleric, amplify your healing, protect yourself from dark magic, and send evil back to hell.

ALCHEMIST
Become a clever alchemist, extract the essence of your enemies, and destill powerful elixirs. Amplify the effect of your potions and protect yourself from disease.



ZOMBIE
Put on the mask of the living dead and become a zombie. Devour fallen enemies to regenerate your health, weaken their stamina, and feed on them when they are vulnerable.

PIRATE
Become a fierce old pirate, swing your saber, unearth hidden treasures and steal your enemies' goods and chattels.

ASSASSIN
Become a deadly assassin and surprise enemies from behind. Deal lethal stealth damage and move faster while sneaking.



SKELETON
Join the hordes of evil and become a slurping skeleton. Consume the souls of your enemies and weaken them with your unholy prescence.

DRUID
Become a druid of the forest, become a deadly archer, and use your knowledge of animals and nature to your advantage.

WARLOCK
Become a sinister Warlock, reflect damage and projectiles back to the attacker, and deal devastating damage at the cost of your health.



WITCH DOCTOR
Become a witch doctor, sacrifice the dead to regenerate stamina, curse your enemies and protect yourself from possession.

RAIDBORN
Follow your destiny and become the Raidborn. Increase your wealth and be blessed by the shine of gold.

DARK KNIGHT
Become the infamous dark knight and destroy your enemies with brute force and violence.

content_descriptors.notes: Raidborn contains fantasy violence against human and non-human characters and the depiction of blood.
